item.title: Watch: Moment train collides with lorry carrying vehicles
item.description: According to police in Texas, the truck was transporting a full load of cars when it stopped on the railroad tracks.

item.title: Agony for families as landslide death toll climbs in Uganda and Kenya
item.description: More than 40 people are known to have died since last week, according to officials.

item.title: Guinea's coup leader enters presidential race
item.description: Col Mamadi Doumbouya has broken his promise to hand power to a civilian government.

item.title: ChatGPT owner OpenAI signs $38bn cloud computing deal with Amazon
item.description: The seven-year agreement will see OpenAI gain access to Nvidia graphics processors to train its artificial intelligence models.

item.title: Watch: Moment medieval tower partially collapses in Rome
item.description: The partial collapse of the Torre dei Conti - close to the Colosseum - has trapped one man and left another critically injured.
